text:
New York, NY - Octopart (YC W07) - Sales Account Executive

Octopart the leading search engine for electronic components. We're a team of 14 based in NYC and we're looking for entry level sales account executives to join our team. Knowledge of the electronics industry is not required, but an eagerness to learn is. If you're interested, please send your resume and a note about yourself to jobs@octopart.com. Must be in NYC or willing to relocate.

More information is available at http://octopart.com/jobs
